params._allowListProof: The Merkle proof for the allowlist (empty if no allowlist)
params._creator: The creator who registered the Merkle root
params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root containing this token
params._originContract: The contract address of the token
params._proof: The Merkle proof for this token

returns._0: The AllowListConfig struct containing the allowlist configuration
The MerkleSalePriceConfig struct containing the sale price configuration

params._creator: The creator who registered the root

params._root: The Merkle root to check against

params._currency: The currency address for the sale price (address(0) for ETH)
params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root of the token set
params._splitAddresses: Array of addresses to split the payment with
params._splitRatios: Array of ratios for payment splits

params._allowListRoot: The Merkle root of allowed addresses
params._endTimestamp: The timestamp after which the allowlist expires
params._merkleRoot: The sale price Merkle root to set allowlist for
